reviewText: It's like having a coach in the home! My daughter one day decided that she wanted to be Drum Major! No coach and not really a good person to teach her even close. She went to a drum Major competition and came in last place. I found this video and she practiced everyday and she understood then what the judges were counting her down and could she where she needed to improve. She went to her last competition which was 3 week after her first one and she received 4th place. This might not sound great to most but within 3 weeks she went from last to 4th! Thank you for making this video! I was able to see my daughter's self esteem improve dramatically!

Basic mace techniques provides a very in-depth and easily understandable methodology to become a versatile drum major.  I highly recommend this dvd for any individual interested in either becoming a drum major for the first time or looking to improve performance.
